summary: This document is a series of photo sheets from the Lieutenant's Office at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, documenting the suicide of inmate Jeffrey Epstein. It records the incident time, location, and the taking of photographs as part of the official response.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate who died by suicide at the Metropolitan Correctional Center. He is the subject of the incident report and photographs.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein's Suicide
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, an incident officially classified as an inmate suicide.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, N.Y.
Location ZA (within MCC, likely a cell or unit)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein died by suicide on August 10, 2019, at 6:33 AM at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The incident was officially documented as 'INMATE SUICIDE' by the facility's Lieutenant's Office.
Photographs of the scene were taken starting at 6:49 AM on the same day as part of the official record.
The specific location of the incident within the facility is noted as 'ZA'.
